description: Lightly spiced honey roasted parsnip makes this salad a hearty and delicious lunch option.
keywords: Green salad,Pescatarian,Orange,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Kale,Dairy free
name: Roasted Parsnip & Kale Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g parsnips, peeled and chopped into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Whisk the olive oil, honey, garam masala, orange juice and zest together in a small bowl to make a dressing.
Spread the parsnip wedges out on a baking tray and drizzle with half of the dressing. Toss to coat. Roast for 40 minutes, turning halfway through.
Add the kale and flaked almonds and roast for 5 minutes. Toss the roasted vegetables in a bowl with red cabbage and the rest of the dressing.
